## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What age can my daughter start getting braids?**
A: We recommend age 4 and up. This is when most children can sit comfortably.

**Q: Do you work with tender-headed kids?**
A: Yes! We specialize in gentle braiding for tender-headed and sensitive children.

**Q: Do you offer mobile/house call service?**
A: Yes, we offer mobile braiding throughout Henry County including McDonough, Stockbridge, Hampton, and Locust Grove.

**Q: How much do kids braids cost?**
A: Kids braiding starts at $45. Final price depends on style and length.

**Q: How long do the braids last?**
